name: Each War of Ours
description:
Each War of Ours is a solo tabletop roleplaying game that focuses on the stories of a group of people trying to their best to survive in tough times.

Inspired by This War of Mine and the mechanics of Dead of Winter, this is a condensed version that aims to capture the essence of similar games within 10 - 15 mins.

The game uses an index card sized board and requires 3 dice and two tokens.

  • Each War of Ours was made for Index Card Game Jam,
  • by Gaming Alone Together,
  • using photos from Noah Silliman on Unsplash,
  • and Mockup templates from Freepik.
